name: Old Ways
description:
As a true loyal pagan worshiper you must bring sacrifices to altars of your god. Don't let progressive green people stop you because if you fail, your beloved god will bring his wrath on humanity!

Please download the game for best possible quality. Thank you! :)

Controls: Arrow Keys

This game is my take on "Sacrifices must be made" theme in Ludum Dare 43 game jam and was made in 48 hours.

Software: Unity, Blender, Audacity, MS 3D Paint, Bosca Ceoil
